nodes.text: The Kora Biedies was a river on the planet Akiva. It was situated near Trabzon Road, a street in the capital city Myrra. Following the Battle of Endor, the junk dealer Temmin Wexley instructed his B1-series battle droid Mister Bones to dump the unconscious bodies of several criminals sent by the crime lord Surat Nuat into the Kora Biedies.
